Episodes.Title: The Hanged Man
Episodes.Plot: Rising artisan Leonardo da Vinci is commissioned by the powerful Medici to create an Easter spectacle in Florence. After some maneuvering, da Vinci is hired to engineer war machines. A mysterious Turk intrigues Leonardo.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Serpent
Episodes.Plot: Leonardo continues his quest for the Book of Leaves. The Pope?s nephew arrives and meets his spy. Leonardo?s war designs fail, causing a rift with the Medicis. The Pope learns of Leonardo?s prowess.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.Writer: David S. Goyer, Scott M. Gimple
Episodes.GuestStars: Ken Bones, Tim Faraday, Grant Stimpson, Mark Sumner, Ross O'Hennessey, Andrew Brooke, Erik Madsen, Ian Pirie, David Sterne, Bill Thomas, Celyn Jones, Paul Westwood

Episodes.Title: The Prisoner
Episodes.Plot: Riario engages the Pope and a mysterious prisoner in a discussion concerning the count's defeat, while Leonardo searches for a rational explanation when an outbreak of demonic possession occurs at a convent, and the blame is placed on the Medicis.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Magician
Episodes.Plot: Bechhi is accused of being a spy for Rome. The armies of Rome and Florence face off, and Leonardo reveals his latest weapon.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence, nudity, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Ted Allpress, Iain Mitchell, Jack Farthing, David Blackwell, Wyn Bowen Jones, Jack Baggs, James Peake, Andrew Brooke, Gareth Milton, Ross O'Hennessey, Ian Pirie, Simon Armstrong, Joe Claflin, John Cording, Tim Fara

Episodes.Title: The Tower
Episodes.Plot: Lorenzo orders Piero da Vinci to defend his estranged son in court. During a performance for visiting royalty, Leonardo surprises the corrupt judge. Back at his workshop, Leonardo is surprised by the Turk.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Devil
Episodes.Plot: A clue from the Turk about the Book of Leaves sends Leonardo to Wallachia, where he encounters Vlad Dracula. Lorenzo and Piero meet the Duke of Urbino. The search for the true spy continues.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ian Pirie, Jason Langley, David Sturzaker, Ross O'Hennessey

Episodes.Title: The Hierophant
Episodes.Plot: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and uses the sewers to enter the Vatican, where he meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the true identity of Rome's spy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Lovers
Episodes.Plot: The Pazzis prepare a murderous plot for Easter Sunday. The Turk tells Leonardo where to find the Book of Leaves. Lucrezia makes a confession as Leonardo attempts to save the Medicis.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.Writer: David S. Goyer, Brian Nelson, Corey Reed
Episodes.GuestStars: Ben Loyd-Holmes, Stephen Marzella, David Sturzaker, Tim Faraday, Jason Langley, Geoffrey Newland, Ross O'Hennessey, David Sterne
